content: A national park wants to improve its trail system by adding new hiking trails and upgrading existing ones. The park currently has 100 miles of trails, with an average maintenance cost of $500 per mile per year. The proposed expansion would add another 50 miles of trails, but these new trails are expected to have higher maintenance costs due to more challenging terrain. Estimate the annual maintenance budget required for the expanded trail system, taking into account the differences in maintenance costs between the existing and new trails.
